prod.full_name: Nike LD Waffle SF sacai Fragment Grey
prod.path: Home/Sneakers/Nike/Sacai/Nike LD Waffle SF Sacai Fragment Grey
prod.desciption:
The Nike LDWaffle sacai Fragment Grey features a grey mesh upper with layered suede overlays and white leather doubled Swooshes. On the side of the doubled sole, both sacai and Fragment branding is printed in black. From there, a doubled tongue with woven labels completes the design.

The Nike LDWaffle sacai Fragment Grey released in August of 2021 and retailed for $170.
